thread.title: Teaser of Thala Ajith’s 'Vedhalam'!
thread.title_full: Teaser of Thala Ajith’s 'Vedhalam'! - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Teaser of Thala Ajith’s 'Vedhalam'!
text:
The much awaited teaser of Ajith's latest film 'Vedalam' was released last night. The 45 second teaser gives a glimpse of Ajith's character and the teaser ending with Ajith saying 'Theirka vidalama?' has impressed the audience. Vedalam is a family oriented movie written and directed by Siruthai Siva with music by Anirudh Ravichander. The movie is about the relationship of brother and sister played by actors Ajith and Lakshmi Menon, with Shruti Haasan playing the female lead.
Ajith is known for his love for bikes and cars and has also been a racer himself. Looks like in all his recent films, Ajith will be showcasing his talent with bikes in Vedalam as well. He will be seen riding a Ducati 1199 Panigale, which is 1,198 cc sports bike.
